title: Women's Elite Run Tight - Black
text:

The Elite line sets the standard in performance, comfort and style.  The Elite collection is comprised of sleek and luxurious triathlon essentials that will find a home in every triathlete’s wardrobe.  Crafted with dyed black premium Italian fabrics and trims, this collection is built for a high-performance, sophisticated look.

The Elite Run Tight is designed for year-round running, yoga and all day wear, not just your workout. The luxurious slimming high waistband makes this an extremely comfortable and stylish tight for any activity.

FEATURES

FIT

Zoot products are designed to be RACE FIT to maximize performance and aerodynamic benefits. For a less compressive feel we recommend you size up. If you are between sizes, we recommend you size up.

Model is 5'10" (178 cm) and 130 lbs (59kg). She is wearing size MEDIUM.

FABRIC

SHIPPING

Orders ship within 1-2 business days.  All orders ship USPS or FED EX from our Zoot HQ in Southern California.

30-DAY RETURNS

ZOOT OHANA GUARANTEE

If you are not satisfied with the look, fit or feel of your Zoot product, return it within 30 days for a full refund.

We will even pay for the return shipping!

* Sale section items are eligible for return. Customer is responsible for return shipping on items purchased in the sale section of website.

*All Customized gear and Face Covering products are not eligible for return or exchange.

Amazing feel and love the fabric ! Best pair of run tights

Overall I liked these. First time going in a small and was surprised how loose the waist was, compared to the legs, but that could just be me. Felt great running.

Light compressive feel and did not slouch on my runs. Perfect to go with any top!

So excited about this new line from Zoot. I bought the tights and 3" run shorts. The tights are awesome, my only issue is, they might run a little bigger than some other tights/leggings I've purchased. I always wear a medium and the medium feels bigger than I'd like. I'd like a bit more compression.

I love the sleekness of the run tight. I am 5’5 so they are a little longer on me. The run tights are super comfortable though and move well from physical activity to running errands.

Amazing feel and love the fabric ! Best pair of run tights

Overall I liked these. First time going in a small and was surprised how loose the waist was, compared to the legs, but that could just be me. Felt great running.

Light compressive feel and did not slouch on my runs. Perfect to go with any top!

So excited about this new line from Zoot. I bought the tights and 3" run shorts. The tights are awesome, my only issue is, they might run a little bigger than some other tights/leggings I've purchased. I always wear a medium and the medium feels bigger than I'd like. I'd like a bit more compression.

I love the sleekness of the run tight. I am 5’5 so they are a little longer on me. The run tights are super comfortable though and move well from physical activity to running errands.

json_ld.name: Women's Elite Run Tight - Black
json_ld.description:
The Elite line sets the standard in performance, comfort and style.  The Elite collection is comprised of sleek and luxurious triathlon essentials that will find a home in every triathlete’s wardrobe.  Crafted with dyed black premium Italian fabrics and trims, this collection is built for a high-performance, sophisticated look. 

The Elite Run Tight is designed for year-round running, yoga and all day wear, not just your workout. The luxurious slimming high waistband makes this an extremely comfortable and stylish tight for any activity. 

FEATURES
  • Italian double knit fabric adds light compression with a luxurious smooth feel and a great range of motion
  • High waist comfort waistband
  • Flatlock stitch construction ensures next-to-skin comfort, and minimizes chafing
  • UPF 50+
  • 27" (68.5cm) inseam
FIT

Zoot products are designed to be RACE FIT to maximize performance and aerodynamic benefits. For a less compressive feel we recommend you size up. If you are between sizes, we recommend you size up.

Model is 5'10" (178 cm) and 130 lbs (59kg). She is wearing size MEDIUM.

FABRIC
  • Body:  78% Polyamide / 22% Elastane, 160gm2
